Line17.ACEF6: Once you’ve brought peace to this realm, I will be able to give you my blessing.
Line15.ACEF6: His meddling has drawn echoes of the past to my refuge of Hatred. But you and I can put things back in order.
Line13.ACEF6: That mortal Elias seeks to use the power of the Primes for his own ends. No one knows their place anymore, do they?
Line11.ACEF6: Yes, but that doesn’t mean we can’t help each other.
Line5.ACEF6: I go by many names. You spoke one of them at the shrine.
Line1.ACEF6: Good to see you’re still alive.
